SuperRobot:Machine Awakening Power.NAME: Machine Awakening
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, the AI will channel N random Orbs according to your situation. N equals the amount of max Orb slots/2 when you have this power.

SuperRobot:SnowStorm.NAME: Weather:Snow Storm
